page.title: 05Housing
page.content: In this area there are mainly semi-detatched corporation houses.In one particular area there are a lot of bungalows.A lot of new estates have been built with private houses on the site.I live in a corporation house,for which we pay rent.It has three bedrooms,a bathroom and a toilet upstairs and a living room and a kitchen downstairs.In the new houses there are fitted kitchens,curtains and carpets right through the house,which are all included in the price of the house.The largest houses have four bedrooms,a toilet and a bathroom upstairs and a living room,dining room and a kitchen and a toilet downstairs.
